title: Understanding the Jordan Peterson Phenomenon in the Light of Meaning Crisis
description:
What in the culture created the JBP moment? Why did it explode so fast? What did he offer that so many men needed just at that moment? Meaning. 

First Australia Lecture https://youtu.be/H_prMglq2Xg
Alistair Roberts Interview https://youtu.be/sYbEowcANUk
Buddhism and Cognitive Science Series https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCz-xSgYNrI2r2VgkCZLn_1w
ThinkBig Animation https://www.youtube.com/user/zekedeg
Vervaeke Channel https://www.youtube.com/user/johnvervaeke
Symptoms of the Meaning Crisis https://youtu.be/Sd549Qz957k
Owen Barfield Rediscovery of Meaning https://www.amazon.com/Rediscovery-Meaning-Other-Essays/dp/0956942334/
CS Lewis The Discarded Image https://www.amazon.com/Discarded-Image-Introduction-Renaissance-Literature-ebook/dp/B00DB3FVCK
Hobbit Wardrobe Great War https://www.amazon.com/Hobbit-Wardrobe-Great-War-Rediscovered-ebook/dp/B00PWOH1EM
JBP March 2019 Q/A https://youtu.be/CfQZcpaBqo4
JBP Liberty U Convocation https://youtu.be/aDepoPl1oEM
Deadly Boredom of a Meaningless Life https://quillette.com/2019/08/07/the-deadly-boredom-of-a-meaningless-life/
Unbelievable Vernon Guite https://youtu.be/2LIg0Xh3Sbk
